# (APPENDIX) Appendix {-}

# Chunk and Package Options {#chunk-options-all}

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
# retrieve md from Yihui's website ----
url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rbind/yihui/master/content/knitr/options.md"
txt = xfun::read_utf8(url)

# edit markdown ----
end_of_yaml = grep("^---", txt)[2]
txt = txt[(end_of_yaml+1):length(txt)]
txt = sub("This page documents", "This document describes", txt)
txt = sub("## Chunk Options", "## Chunk Options {#chunk-options-details}", txt)

# output raw te xt ----
cat(txt, sep = '\n')
```
